DOC.brief_title: Ocular Response Analyzer Assessment Intraocular Pressure Corneal Biomechanical Properties Myopic Anisometropic Patients Under Atropine Treatment
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal ocular health myopia anisometropia 2 . In good general health history prematurity cardiac significant respiratory diseases 3 . No allergy atropine , tropicamide , proparacaine , benzalkonium chloride 4 . No previous current use contact lens , bifocals , progressive addition lenses 5 . No amblyopia manifest strabismus , include intermittent tropia 1. presence keratoconus corneal disease 2. previous eye drop usage except Atropine 3. major ocular surgery history ( include refractive surgery , scleral buckle , glaucoma filtering , cornea transplant , cataract vitreoretinal surgery ) 4. presence ocular condition glaucoma , uveitis , ocular inflammatory vitreoretinal disease .
